sentences.en: He was aptly described as 'tall, dark, and handsome'.
sentences.cn: 他被恰如其分地描述为“高大黝黑、相貌堂堂”。

sentences.en: The Basketball Hall of Fame gave Wilt an aptly-named "Stilt".
sentences.cn: 篮球名人堂给了威尔特一个恰如其人的绰号是“高跷”。

sentences.en: Try the aptly-named Oink to reduce the memory usage of your Rails application.
sentences.cn: 尝试使用名称恰当的 Oink 来减少 Rails 应用程序的内存使用。
